posts.post_content:
Hello all, I need the following T206's graded SGC 40-60 ONLY, no raw, no PSA. No creases in the 40's please. I need the following (I need ALOT more than this, these are just my top wants right now):
Mike Powers
Fred Merkle (throwing)
Chief Meyers (portrait)
Billy Sullivan
Bill Dahlen
Fred Tenney
Frank Bowerman
Ed Killian (portrait)
Red Ames (portrait)
George Gibson
Larry Doyle (throwing)
I also need the following type cards for my backs collection (no HOF'ers or cards priced over $100): Tolstoi, EPDG, Sovereign 150 & 460, Cycle 460, Sweet Cap 350-460 (all factories) and both overprints, AB 350 w/ & w/o frame. Same criteria as above cards only please.
Send all scans, front and back to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]
